## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/rewriterope">RewriteRope</a> - A powerful string class.

This class supports extremely efficient insertions and deletions into the middle of it, even for ridiculously long strings.

Definition at line 171 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/rewriterope-h">RewriteRope.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### MakeRopeString() {#a34bd57e11a0023a96e8034261e3e5f6e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RopePiece RewriteRope::MakeRopeString (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Start, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; End)</>}>
MakeRopeString - This copies the specified byte range into some instance of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/roperefcountstring">RopeRefCountString</a>, and return a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/ropepiece">RopePiece</a> that represents it.

This uses the AllocBuffer object to aggregate requests for small strings into one allocation instead of doing tons of tiny allocations.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/rewriterope-h/#l00218">218</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/rewriterope-h">RewriteRope.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp/#l00765">765</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/rewriterope-cpp">RewriteRope.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### AllocBuffer {#a22273f2a70441db8f3a6b38779fa27b7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::IntrusiveRefCntPtr&lt;RopeRefCountString&gt; llvm::RewriteRope::AllocBuffer</>}>
We allocate space for string data out of a buffer of size AllocChunkSize.

This keeps track of how much space is left.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/rewriterope-h/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/rewriterope-h">RewriteRope.h</a>.
